text: Hi, how are you today?
I'm well, how are you?
excellent, are you familiar with the charity Save the Children?
I have not heard of it.
they are an NGO that promotes children's rights and poverty relief in developing nations.
that sounds like tireless work; especially today
I am sure that is case. It is one of the most respected charities of its type. Given its universal appeal can I convince you to donate some portion of your payment to the charity today?
I sounds like a great charity but I donate to local charities.
do you live in the United States?
I do, North Carolina.

it is true that there are hungry children living in poverty in the United States but we have a safety net, maybe not as good of one as we should, but there are government programs at the ready to help. Children in developing countries often have little access to food and clean water with outside help.

I agree children all over the world need help. The charity that I help with is for homeless children in my community.  There parents are the working poor that can't fully use our social safety nets.  They are the ones that our current government has forgotten about.
fair enough, I assume mechanical turk then is not a primary source of income and diversion or just fun?
Correct, it is not my primary source of income but a means to supplement what I give to my community.
I am willing to match any portion of you payment you choose to donate, doubling the amount is not an opportunity available outside of this forum
That is very generous.  I will donate $1 of the payment
fantastic, I would love to donate a 1.
I'm glad we can agree
as am I, my office is right up the street from Save the Children.
if you are ever looking for a worthy charity in the States please consider A Child's Place.
